description: Numbers whose set of base 15 digits is {1,4}.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: a(1)=1, a(2)=4; a(n) = 15*a(floor(n/2))+1 for n odd, otherwise a(n) = 15*a(floor((n-1)/2))+4. [_Bruno Berselli_, May 28 2012]
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..60000] | Set(IntegerToSequence(n, 15)) subset {1, 4}]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, May 28 2012(Maxima) a[1]:1$ a[2]:4$ a[n]:= if oddp(n) then 15*a[floor(n/2)]+1 else 15*a[floor((n-1)/2)]+4$ makelist(a[n],n,1,38); [_Bruno Berselli_, May 28 2012]
author: _Clark Kimberling_
